artworks.title: Efi with goopy goops
artworks.description: An illustration of Efi- my DnD squadmates character in an adventure where she kept collecting goopy goop.

artworks.title: Xaduma catmaid
artworks.description: Xaduma is a musician. He is in a music collective Life gets worse, and joked about someone drawing him as a catmaid. I was the one to do it.
